name: MyPangea
tag_list: pangea, social-media-aggregation, social-media-aggregator, social-supercontinent, supercontinent, social-network, social-media, all-in-one
overview:
MyPangea allows users to manage their entire online presence while simultaneously connecting them to their friends or fans through an easy to use social networking platform.

Users can bookmark all of their favorite websites, receive updates from the largest social networks, check their emails, and chat with their buddies on multiple messengers with one universal profile. In addition to this, MyPangea has its very own messenger that enables audio and video chat along with file transfer.

Currently they integrate the following networks and services: Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, MySpace, Gmail, Hotmail, AOL, Yahoo Email, AIM, MSN, ICQ, Gtalk, Yahoo Messenger and Facebook Chat.
